name.description: Name of the plugin to install. In ES 2.x, the name can be an url or file location

proxy_host.description: Proxy host to use during plugin installation

url.description: Set exact URL to download the plugin from (Only works for ES 1.x)

proxy_port.description: Proxy port to use during plugin installation

version.description: Version of the plugin to be installed. If plugin exists with previous version, it will NOT be updated

plugin_dir.description: Your configured plugin directory specified in Elasticsearch
